name: LivingWillCodes
title: livingWillCodes
description: Code system of concepts specifying whether or not the patient has a living will and, if so, whether a copy fo the living will is on file at the healthcare facility.  If the patient does not have a living will, the value of this field indicates whether the patient was provided information on living wills.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the Patient Visit - Additional Information ( PV2) and Patient Additional Demographic (PD1) segments.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0315 (Living Will Code)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

concept.display: Yes, patient has a living will
concept.definition: Yes, patient has a living will

concept.display: Yes, patient has a living will but it is not on file
concept.definition: Yes, patient has a living will but it is not on file

concept.display: No, patient does not have a living will and no information was provided
concept.definition: No, patient does not have a living will and no information was provided

concept.display: No, patient does not have a living will but information was provided
concept.definition: No, patient does not have a living will but information was provided
